item.title: How Blacksmith used Tailscale Services to work around ISP degradation
item.description: TL;DR: We built a transparent proxy that routes GitHub traffic through an alternate network path with direct GitHub peering, giving our runners defence-in-depth against ISP routing failures. This proxy uses the newly announced Tailscale Services for secure load balancing and Squid for high-performance proxying and caching.
